languages.text: "Мы спрятались в контейнере, когда на "Бессердечном" запахло жареным. Выберемся, когда добро разгрузят на портовом складе. Держу пари, пустоголовые законники даже не поймут, что своими руками привезли парочку крыс к бесценному хабару. Жратвы тут, правда, нет, и от холода колотит то и дело. Ничего, потерпим. Не повезут же они это все на другой край сектора, верно? Скоро Трей и Кайра станут самыми богатыми крысами в Просторе!"

"We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"
languages.original_text: "Мы спрятались в контейнере, когда на "Бессердечном" запахло жареным. Выберемся, когда добро разгрузят на портовом складе. Держу пари, пустоголовые законники даже не поймут, что своими руками привезли парочку крыс к бесценному хабару. Жратвы тут, правда, нет, и от холода колотит то и дело. Ничего, потерпим. Не повезут же они это все на другой край сектора, верно? Скоро Трей и Кайра станут самыми богатыми крысами в Просторе!"

traits.locale_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed dogs of the law won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

"We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

languages.text: «Nos escondimos en el contenedor cuando las cosas empezaron a tener mala pinta en la Desalmada. Saldremos cuando descarguen la mercancía en el almacén del puerto. Apuesto a que esos juristas estirados ni se imaginan que han traído unas ratitas a su preciado escondite. Eso sí, aquí de comida nada y hace un frío de muerte, pero nos apañaremos. Tampoco es que vayan a llevarse todo esto al otro extremo del sector, ¿no? ¡Pronto, Trei y Kaira serán las ratas más ricas de toda la Extensión!».
languages.original_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: «Nos escondimos en el contenedor cuando las cosas empezaron a tener mala pinta en la Desalmada. Saldremos cuando descarguen la mercancía en el almacén del puerto. Apuesto a que esos juristas estirados ni se imaginan que han traído unas ratitas a su preciado escondite. Eso sí, aquí de comida nada y hace un frío de muerte, pero nos apañaremos. Tampoco es que vayan a llevarse todo esto al otro extremo del sector, ¿no? ¡Pronto, Trei y Kaira serán las ratas más ricas de toda la Extensión!».

languages.text: “无心号情况不妙的时候，我们就赶紧躲到了集装箱里。我打算等他们把货物卸到港口仓库之后，就马上爬出去。我敢打赌，那些猪脑子根本意识不到，他们把两只贼鼠带进了装满财宝的宝库里。不过这里没有吃的，而且冷得像坟地一样，但问题不大，我们肯定能想办法撑下来。毕竟，他们总不能把这些东西拖到星区的另一边吧？用不了多久，特雷和凯拉就会成为整个科罗努斯扩区最有钱的贼鼠了！”
languages.original_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: “无心号情况不妙的时候，我们就赶紧躲到了集装箱里。我打算等他们把货物卸到港口仓库之后，就马上爬出去。我敢打赌，那些猪脑子根本意识不到，他们把两只贼鼠带进了装满财宝的宝库里。不过这里没有吃的，而且冷得像坟地一样，但问题不大，我们肯定能想办法撑下来。毕竟，他们总不能把这些东西拖到星区的另一边吧？用不了多久，特雷和凯拉就会成为整个科罗努斯扩区最有钱的贼鼠了！”

languages.text: 「古いハートレスで状況が悪くなり始めたとき、俺たちはコンテナに隠れた。荷物が港の倉庫に運ばれるのを待って、そっから出て行くつもりだ。この鈍い法執行官たちは、彼らの大事な宝庫のそばに二匹のネズミを親切に運んでいるとは気づかないだろう。食べ物はないが、お墓のように冷たい。大丈夫、何とかする。彼らは、セクターの反対側に全部を持って行くはずはないだろう？すぐに、ティレイとカイラは全エキスパンスで一番お金持ちのネズミになるぞ！」
languages.original_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: 「古いハートレスで状況が悪くなり始めたとき、俺たちはコンテナに隠れた。荷物が港の倉庫に運ばれるのを待って、そっから出て行くつもりだ。この鈍い法執行官たちは、彼らの大事な宝庫のそばに二匹のネズミを親切に運んでいるとは気づかないだろう。食べ物はないが、お墓のように冷たい。大丈夫、何とかする。彼らは、セクターの反対側に全部を持って行くはずはないだろう？すぐに、ティレイとカイラは全エキスパンスで一番お金持ちのネズミになるぞ！」

languages.text: "Wir haben uns in dem Container versteckt, als die Kacke auf der Heartless am Dampfen war. Wir klettern raus, sobald sie im Hafen die Fracht löschen. Ich wette, diese dämlichen Gesetzeshüter werden gar nicht merken, dass sie zwei süße Ratten in ihren kostbaren Hort gebracht haben. Wir haben nichts zu essen und es ist scheißkalt hier. Aber wir kriegen das hin. Die werden den ganzen Kram ja nicht auf andere Seite des Sektors bringen, oder? Bald werden Trei und Kaira die reichsten Ratten der gesamten Ausdehnung sein!"
languages.original_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben uns in dem Container versteckt, als die Kacke auf der Heartless am Dampfen war. Wir klettern raus, sobald sie im Hafen die Fracht löschen. Ich wette, diese dämlichen Gesetzeshüter werden gar nicht merken, dass sie zwei süße Ratten in ihren kostbaren Hort gebracht haben. Wir haben nichts zu essen und es ist scheißkalt hier. Aber wir kriegen das hin. Die werden den ganzen Kram ja nicht auf andere Seite des Sektors bringen, oder? Bald werden Trei und Kaira die reichsten Ratten der gesamten Ausdehnung sein!"

languages.text: « On s'est planqués dans le conteneur quand la situation a commencé à dégénérer à bord du vieux Sans-Cœur. On en sortira après déchargement de la cargaison à l'entrepôt du port. Je parie que ces abrutis de miliciens s'apercevront même pas qu'ils ont gentiment fait entrer des rats dans leur précieuse chambre forte. Dommage qu'on ait rien à becqueter et qu'il fasse un froid de canard, mais c'est qu'un mauvais moment à passer. Après tout, ils vont tout de même pas traîner tout ce bazar à l'autre bout de la galaxie ! Bientôt, Trei et Kaira seront les rats les plus riches des Étendues ! »
languages.original_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"

Je parie que ces abrutis de miliciens s'apercevront même pas qu'ils ont gentiment fait entrer des rats dans leur précieuse chambre forte. Dommage qu'on ait rien à becqueter et qu'il fasse un froid de canard, mais c'est qu'un mauvais moment à passer. Après tout, ils vont tout de même pas traîner tout ce bazar à l'autre bout de la galaxie ! Bientôt, Trei et Kaira seront les rats les plus riches des Étendues ! »

languages.text: "İhtiyar Kalpsiz'de durum kötüleşmeye başlayınca konteynerin içine girip saklandık. Malları liman deposuna indirsinler, çıkarız. Bahse varım kalın kafalı kanuncular, kıymetli istiflerine birkaç sıçan kaçırdıklarını fark etmeyecektir. Gerçi burada yiyecek namına bir şey yok, mezar kadar da soğuk. Sorun değil, idare ederiz. Bunca şeyi sektörün diğer ucuna sürükleyecek hâlleri yok ya? Yakında Trei ve Kaira, tüm Enginlik'teki en zengin sıçanlar olacak!"
languages.original_text: "We hid in the container when things started to look bad on the old Heartless. We'll climb out once they unload the goods at the port warehouse. I bet those thick-headed lawmen won't even realise they've graciously brought a couple of ratsies right to their precious hoard. Got no food here, though, and it's cold as a grave. It's fine, we'll manage. They're not gonna drag all this to the other side of the sector, are they? Soon, Trei and Kaira are gonna be the richest rats in the whole Expanse!"
